exceptions.exn: Cannot find an homogeneous relation to rewrite.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Your Response:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

Your Response:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
None

Goal:
forall (T : System) (f g h : Formula), SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) T f) h -> SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) T g) h -> SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) T (orH f g)) h

Premises:
Module fol := Struct Record Language : Type := language { Relations : Set; Functions : Set; arity : Relations + Functions -> nat } Definition Relations : Language -> Set. Definition Functions : Language -> Set. Definition arity : forall l : Language, Relations l + Functions l -> nat. Inductive Term (L : Language) : Set := var : nat -> Term L | apply : forall f : Functions L, Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> Term L with Terms (L : Language) : nat -> Set := Tnil : Terms L 0 | Tcons : forall n : nat, Term L -> Terms L n -> Terms L (S n) Definition Term_rect : forall (L : Language) (P : Term L -> Type), (forall n : nat, P (var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (
SysPrf = folProof.SysPrf LNN : fol.System LNN -> fol.Formula LNN -> Prop
Formula = fol.Formula LNN : Set
Add : forall A : Type, A -> list A -> list A -> Prop
orH = fol.orH LNN : fol.Formula LNN -> fol.Formula LNN -> fol.Formula LNN
System = fol.System LNN : Type
LNN = {| Relations := LNNRelation; Functions := LNTFunction; arity := LNNArity |} : Language
Module Ensembles := Struct Definition Ensemble : Type -> Type. Definition In : forall U : Type, Ensemble U -> U -> Prop. Definition Included : forall U : Type, Ensemble U -> Ensemble U -> Prop. Inductive Empty_set (U : Type) : Ensemble U := Definition Empty_set_rect : forall (U : Type) (P : U -> Type) (u : U), Empty_set U u -> P u. Definition Empty_set_ind : forall (U : Type) (P : U -> Prop) (u : U), Empty_set U u -> P u. Definition Empty_set_rec : forall (U : Type) (P : U -> Set) (u : U), Empty_set U u -> P u. Definition Empty_set_sind : forall (U : Type) (P : U -> SProp) (u : U), Empty_set U u
orSys : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f g h : fol.Formula L), folProof.SysPrf L (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula L) T f) h -> folProof.SysPrf L (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula L) T g) h -> folProof.SysPrf L (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula L) T (fol.orH L f g)) h
impI : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) T g) f -> SysPrf T (impH g f)
sysWeaken : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T f -> SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) T g) f
orE : forall (T : System) (f g h : Formula), SysPrf T (orH f g) -> SysPrf T (impH f h) -> SysPrf T (impH g h) -> SysPrf T h
sysExtend : forall (T U : System) (f : Formula), Included (fol.Formula LNN) T U -> SysPrf T f -> SysPrf U f
Axm : forall (T : System) (f : Formula), mem (fol.Formula LNN) T f -> SysPrf T f
orI2 : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T g -> SysPrf T (orH f g)
orI1 : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T f -> SysPrf T (orH f g)
contradiction : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T f -> SysPrf T (notH f) -> SysPrf T g
cp1 : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T (impH (notH f) (notH g)) -> SysPrf T (impH g f)
cp2 : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T (impH g f) -> SysPrf T (impH (notH f) (notH g))
impE : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T (impH g f) -> SysPrf T g -> SysPrf T f
folLogic.orE : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f g h : fol.Formula L), folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.orH L f g) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.impH L f h) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.impH L g h) -> folProof.SysPrf L T h
existSys : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f g : fol.Formula L) (v : nat), ~ In_freeVarSys L v T -> ~ In v (freeVarFormula L g) -> folProof.SysPrf L (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula L) T f) g -> folProof.SysPrf L (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula L) T (fol.existH L v f)) g
folLogic.impI : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f g : fol.Formula L), folProof.SysPrf L (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula L) T g) f -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.impH L g f)
Deduction.DeductionTheorem : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f g : fol.Formula L), folProof.SysPrf L (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula L) T g) f -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.impH L g f)
folLogic.sysWeaken : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f g : fol.Formula L), folProof.SysPrf L T f -> folProof.SysPrf L (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula L) T g) f
noMiddle : forall (T : System) (f : Formula), SysPrf T (orH (notH f) f)
nnI : forall (T : System) (f : Formula), SysPrf T f -> SysPrf T (notH (notH f))
nnE : forall (T : System) (f : Formula), SysPrf T (notH (notH f)) -> SysPrf T f
subProp.subFormulaNTEHelp : forall (L : Language) (f g : fol.Formula L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L), folProof.SysPrf L (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula L) (Empty_set (fol.Formula L)) f) g -> folProof.SysPrf L (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula L) (Empty_set (fol.Formula L)) (substituteFormula L f v s)) (substituteFormula L g v s)
folLogic.Axm : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f : fol.Formula L), mem (fol.Formula L) T f -> folProof.SysPrf L T f
folLogic.sysExtend : forall (L : Language) (T U : fol.System L) (f : fol.Formula L), Included (fol.Formula L) T U -> folProof.SysPrf L T f -> folProof.SysPrf L U f
existE : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f g : fol.Formula L) (v : nat), ~ In_freeVarSys L v T -> ~ In v (freeVarFormula L g) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.existH L v f) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.impH L f g) -> folProof.SysPrf L T g
iffE2 : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f g : fol.Formula L), folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L f g) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.impH L g f)
folLogic.cp1 : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f g : fol.Formula L), folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.impH L (fol.notH L f) (fol.notH L g)) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.impH L g f)
folLogic.cp2 : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f g : fol.Formula L), folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.impH L g f) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.impH L (fol.notH L f) (fol.notH L g))
folLogic.impE : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f g : fol.Formula L), folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.impH L g f) -> folProof.SysPrf L T g -> folProof.SysPrf L T f
iffE1 : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f g : fol.Formula L), folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L f g) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.impH L f g)
folLogic.orI2 : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f g : fol.Formula L), folProof.SysPrf L T g -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.orH L f g)

intros T f g h Hf Hg.
apply orSys.
rewrite <- Hf.
rewrite <- Hg.
auto.
Qed.```
